thread.title: Watch: Trail Blazers go through boxing workout in Los Angeles
thread.title_full: Watch: Trail Blazers go through boxing workout in Los Angeles | OregonLive.com

author: Mike Richman | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Watch: Trail Blazers go through boxing workout in Los Angeles
text:
The Trail Blazers took a day off from the basketball court in on Tuesday, forgoing layup lines for 1-2 combos. With two days off before their next game -- Thursday against the Los Angeles Clippers -- the Blazers stopped by Box N Burn Fitness Gym in Santa Monica to take part in a boxing workout.
Here's a quick swing through the social media sphere for a look at the Blazers' foray into the boxing world that appears to be equal parts fitness and team bonding.
A video posted by Box N Burn Boxing, Fitness Gym (@boxnburn) on Oct 20, 2015 at 1:16pm PDT
Had a good time boxing with the squad @boxnburn !! Great workout , even better team bonding #ripcity
A photo posted by CJMcCollum (@3jmccollum) on Oct 20, 2015 at 2:06pm PDT
the team got in a quick boxing session on our day off in LA. your boy got hands üëäüèæüëäüèæüëäüèæüëäüèæ #teambonding #preseason #ripcity
A photo posted by Gerald Henderson (@g_hender09) on Oct 20, 2015 at 2:54pm PDT
Heavy weight and light weight lol
A photo posted by Cliff Alexander (@cliffalexander34) on Oct 20, 2015 at 1:26pm PDT
Hat tip to Blazers's Edge and TMZ for tracking down the video
